headline: Is It Too Late to Consider Lam Research After a 117% Price Surge in 2025?
summary: Ever wondered if Lam Research's stock is still a bargain or if you've missed the boat entirely? Let's take a closer look at where its value stands today. LRCX has been on a tear, rocketing up 117.4% year-to-date and gaining 8.0% in the last month alone. This suggests that the market may be responding to fresh growth drivers or shifting risk perceptions. Recent headlines have highlighted Lam Research's involvement in advancing semiconductor technologies, with industry chatter focusing on...

headline: Semiconductor Industry Leaders and Last Mile Education Fund Launch First-of-Its-Kind Fund to Tackle U.S. Talent Shortage
summary: The Last Mile Education Fund today announced the launch of the Semiconductor Pathways Fund, an industry-wide initiative to close critical talent gaps in the U.S. semiconductor workforce by enabling financially vulnerable college students to complete their degrees and enter high-demand roles.

headline: JOET: Lagging Competitors Despite Good Fundamentals And Time-Proven Strategy
summary: The Virtus Terranova U.S. Quality Momentum ETF has a portfolio of 125 large and mid-cap stocks blending quality, momentum, and equal-weight methodology. Learn more on JOET ETF here.

headline: 1 Semiconductor Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 We Brush Off
summary: Semiconductors are the core infrastructure powering the Information Age. Compute-intensive AI workloads are also priming them for the next wave of secular growth, so it’s no wonder the industry has outperformed the market over the past six months, delivering returns of 62.7% compared to 21% for the S&P 500.
